CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Domestic_Violence_Assault_Stalking__c,"Yes"), (IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01535000000A8rk","Domestic Violence")), IF( ISPICKVAL(Employer_Made_Immigration_Threats__c,"Yes"), (IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01535000000A8rk","Immigration Protection")), IF( ISPICKVAL(H_S_Complaint_to_Employer_Supervisor__c,"Yes"), (IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01535000000A8rk","OSHA")), IF( ISPICKVAL(H_S_Complaint_with_Govt_Agency__c,"Yes"), (IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01535000000A8rk","OSHA")), IF( ISPICKVAL(Paid_Less_For_Similar_Work__c,"Yes"), (IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01535000000A8rk","Equal Pay")), NULL)))))
CustomField.label: Special Handling Required
